EmailTemplate.subject: Field Update from Marketing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
June 20, 2014 Cloud Foundry Summit is a Wrap! On June 11, Pivotal concluded the phenomenally successful Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com>. Close to 1,000 customers, members and developers from across the Cloud Foundry community gathered to discuss the current and future state of the industry's leading Open Source Platform-as-a-Service. The over 1,300 developer contributions to date, and wide range of ideas, confirm that Cloud Foundry is a game changer <http://blog.gopivotal.com/cloud-foundry-pivotal/p-o-v/field-report-the-3-reasons-why-the-cfsummit-rocked>. Session videos will be posted to the event site in the coming weeks, so stay tuned. Mark Your Calendar Platform: The Pivotal Conference will take place on September 17-19 in San Francisco, CA. Additional information about the event will be available soon. For now…be sure to save the dates! What’s Next? ACM SIGMOD/PODS Conference <http://www.sigmod2014.org/> (June 22-27 in Snowbird, UT)
- Pivotal is exhibiting as a Gold Sponsor at this event. - Contact: Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@gopivotal.com>
Blog: Sigmod Paper: The Advantages of HAWQ (June 23)
- A peer-reviewed paper on the results of a performance study of HAWQ, which was presented at the ACM SIGMOD/PODS Conference. - Contact: David Oro <mailto:doro@gopivotal.com>
Meetup: An Intro to Apache Spark (with Hadoop) for Plain Old Java Geeks <http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Open-Source-Hub/events/184781662/> (June 24 in Palo Alto, CA)
- Pivotal is the organizer of this talk, which will provide an introduction to the principals and use of Apache Spark with a Hadoop/HDFS backend. - Contact: Tamao Nakahara <mailto:tnakahara@gopivotal.com>
Meetup: Cloud Foundry Application Security Groups with Mark Kropf <http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Open-Source-Hub/events/183521842/> (June 25 in San Francisco, CA)
- Pivotal is the organizer of this talk, during which Mark Kropf will describe the work the Pivotal CF Runtime team is doing to implement application security groups. - Contact: Tamao Nakahara <mailto:tnakahara@gopivotal.com>
Spark Summit <http://spark-summit.org/2014> (June 30 - July 2 in San Francisco, CA)
- Pivotal is exhibiting as a Silver Sponsor at this event. Conference passes may be purchased using discount code: Pivotal2014. - Contact: Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@gopivotal.com>
ACM SIGR Conference <http://sigir.org/sigir2014/> (July 6-11 in Gold Coast, Australia)
- Pivotal is exhibiting as a Bronze Sponsor and Hugh Williams will be speaking at this event. - Contact: Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@gopivotal.com>
Pivotal Data Labs Webinar <http://connect.gopivotal.com/Y0C080oA8000v002NUI0fJ2> (July 8 at 9:00am, PDT)
- Pivotal is partnering with Data Science Central to present this educational webinar. Ken Dowling will be speaking on the topic of Data Lakes. - Contact: Katherine Xavier <mailto:kxavier@gopivotal.com>
Meetup: Building a Distributed Data Ingestion System with RabbitMQ (July 16 in Palo Alto, CA <http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Open-Source-Hub/events/187595852/> and July 17 in San Francisco, CA <http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Open-Source-Hub/events/187597992/>)
- Pivotal is the organizer of these talks, which will show what else RabbitMQ has to offer beyond simple messaging and queueing. - Contact: Tamao Nakahara <mailto:tnakahara@gopivotal.com>
OSCON <http://www.oscon.com/oscon2014> (July 20-24 in Portland, OR)
- Pivotal is exhibiting as a Gold Sponsor and will have one speaking session at this event. - Contact: Tamao Nakahara <mailto:tnakahara@gopivotal.com>
VMworld 2014 US <http://www.vmworld.com/community/conference/us> (August 24-28 in San Francisco, CA)
- Contact: Paul Santos <mailto:psantos@gopivotal.com>
EMC Forum <http://hk.emc.com/campaign/global/forum2014/index.htm> (September 5 in Hong Kong)
- Pivotal is participating and will have speaking sessions at this event. - Contact: Sean Lee <mailto:seanlee@gopivotal.com> or Mica Tee <mailto:mtee@gopivotal.com>
SpringOne 2GX <http://springone2gx.com/> (September 8-11 in Dallas, TX)
- Pivotal is the event organizer and several Pivotal employees will be presenting sessions. - Contact: Tamao Nakahara <mailto:tnakahara@gopivotal.com>
CIO Summit Singapore (September 19-21 in Singapore)
- An EMC Federation-led event hosting 50 Global and Enterprise CIOs. Sean Lee will be representing Pivotal as a session speaker. Please note: Access to this event is by invitation only and strictly limited to the attending CIOs and speakers. - Contact: Katherine Xavier <mailto:kxavier@gopivotal.com>
